li.label: ate simple meal
li.description: After finishing this simple meal, I can't shake the suspicion that it might have had vegetables in it...

li.label: ate fine meal
li.description: Despite being labeled as a "fine meal" I found it disappointing to discover vegetables in it. This was anything but "fine" to me!

li.label: ate lavish meal
li.description: Although this meal seems lavish, the presence of vegetables is repulsive to me. I can't believe people eat this!

li.label: ate simple raw meatball
li.description: This simple raw meatball is surprisingly delicious, the taste of the meat alone is enough to satisfy my cravings.

li.label: ate lavish raw meatball
li.description: Indulging in the lavish raw meatball is a culinary pleasure with its refined umami taste that brings a smile to my face.
